page.title: 12 CURRENT AFFAIRS
page.content: Recently, a search for oil began in the local district.North Sea Petroleums Ltd are using a lorry carrying equipment to search for oil along a planned route of roads, by vibrating the road surface. The vitroseismic surveys are being carried out along the road from Harpsden to Crowsley Park and up to Sonning Common, back to Shiplake Row, and from there to Playhatch and Charvil. If the company, a subsidiary of Attock Petroleum, finds there is evidence pointing to gas or oil in the area, they will have to get a production licience. Even if oil is found, it is unlikely that the area will become another Texas - drilling equipment is said to be less obtrusive than the average farm silo.
